amendment.description: Amendment clarifies language contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 107-418 to make various technical and conforming changes; to strike provisions requiring companies listed on the stock exchanges to a code of ethics for senior corporate officers due to workability issues; and to retain provisions regarding disclosure of changes in issuer codes of conduct.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oxley amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
